body:
Hey, guys! I'm StormzInvader. I've been around since the early days of MCZone. Right after Avicus came up, I started to become more loyal to the server as I slowly grew to love each aspect of it. In line with this, I would love to share a couple things with the community!

Ask me anything!
body_tagged:
Hey, guys! I'm StormzInvader. I've been around since the early days of MCZone. Right after Avicus came up, I started to become more loyal to the server as I slowly grew to love each aspect of it. In line with this, I would love to share a couple things with the community!

Ask me anything!
title: My AMA

replies.body:
Lets start with a generic question...
How'd you come up with your name?
replies.body_tagged:
Lets start with a generic question...
How'd you come up with your name?

replies.body:
When I was younger, I used to love watching videos on YouTube. I remember clearly that I was watching videos of The World Ends With You, an NDS game. I saw that the uploader's name had a "z" in it, and it sounded pretty cool. I tried to find different alternatives and possibilities on what sounds nice. I finally found the word "storm" to be pretty cool, so I chose it. 

Now, having the name "Stormz" was too generic for me. I needed another word in my name. This part didn't really have much inspiration, but I was just sitting down in front of the computer for a few minutes until I imagined the word "invade" next to "Stormz". I found this really cool, so it stuck with me ever since. I don't plan on changing it.

Wait Is That About The Rank IDK

replies.body:
@Snow

Let's start with the bad first. :P Well, sometimes, there are a lot of reports that come in. I dislike leaving reports. However, I still try to answer all reports that come in. This is mainly due to me still on another report.

As for the good parts, I just find that helping the people in the community is good for me. Like I said, I joined since the early MC Zone days. During that time, this was when I played Minecraft a lot more than right now. (I still play Minecraft a good amount, just a bit busy right now.) It just gave me great memories to always cherish. Now, I want to spread this to everybody. I want everyone to feel the same happiness that I received last time.

@Rilo
I actually do not know how to answer that question! Haha! Well aside from video games, I like programming, playing Airsoft, producing music, drawing, and ponies. I guess I'm a jack-of-all-trades. If someone needs help in a certain project or such, I can always help them. They don't really have to look for someone else because I am proficient enough in these fields. XD
